info.name: username
info.description: The username of a SharePoint account that is a part of the Farm Administrators group in the 'Central Administration' site.

info.name: password
info.description: The password of the Sharepoint account.

info.name: domain
info.description: The domain of the Sharepoint server where the information will be pulled from.

info.name: homepage_url
info.description: The url for the homepage of the Sharepoint site that this handler will have access to

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
